nodes.text: Rentalles was a terrestrial astronomical object with wasteland terrain. Dagra Van, the beastmaster of Crakka the Hutt, captured a hunanetre on the wastes of Rentalles.

Rentalles was first mentioned in Star Wars Adventures: Return to Vader's Castle 4, a comic written by Cavan Scott and published by IDW Publishing on October 23, 2019. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, Rentalles was first mentioned in Star Wars Miniatures Battles Companion, a sourcebook for Star Wars Miniatures written by Stephen Crane and published by West End Games in 1994.
